name: Hoots in Cage
description:
Walls. Ghosts. Machines. Cosmos.

Controls:

WASD/ZQSD: Move

Mouse: Rotate view

LMB: Interact/Focus

RMD: Unfocus

Space: Beat

Escape (stay pressed): Quit

A game by Titouan Millet and Tom Victor

http://titouanm.com/
